content: If checked all new users will receive welcome letter. Available only when Mail Attribute is mapped to LDAP.

comment.text: This translation key is used for the tooltip that explains when checking "LdapSendWelcomeLetter" enables sending welcome letters to new users, available only when a specific mail attribute is mapped to LDAP. It appears as a HelpButton in an Advanced Settings section of the PortalSettings page.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ميزة البريد" (mail attribute) doesn't fully capture the intended meaning of "Mail Attribute". It's a bit too literal and might be confusing. A more accurate translation might consider how 'mail attribute' relates to the broader LDAP configuration.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Perhaps rephrase to something like: "إذا تم تحديده، فسيتلقى جميع المستخدمين الجدد خطاب ترحيب. متوفر فقط عند ربط سمة البريد بـ LDAP." (If checked all new users will receive welcome letter. Available only when the mail attribute is linked to LDAP.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Arabic text could benefit from improved readability by ensuring consistent spacing around punctuation and within complex phrases. While not a critical error, it enhances the user experience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Review the overall formatting and spacing to ensure consistent and clear presentation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Mail Xüsusiyyəti" could be improved for clarity and consistency. "Mail Xüsusiyyəti" translates literally to "Mail Attribute" but may not be the most natural phrasing in Azerbaijani. Consider rephrasing for better flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Mail Xüsusiyyətinin LDAP-a uyğunlaşdırıldıqda əlçatandır.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'приветстващо' is a less common and potentially less clear way to say 'welcome'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Приветствено

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Χαρακτηριστικό Αλληλογραφίας" is a very literal and somewhat awkward translation of "Mail Attribute". A more natural phrasing might be "Χαρακτηριστικό Email" or "Πεδίο Email".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Εάν είναι επιλεγμένο, όλοι οι νέοι χρήστες θα λάβουν επιστολή καλωσορίσματος. Διαθέσιμο μόνο όταν το Πεδίο Email έχει αντιστοιχιστεί στο LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, using a more active voice could improve readability. Consider revising the sentence structure.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Εάν είναι επιλεγμένο, όλοι οι νέοι χρήστες θα λάβουν επιστολή καλωσορίσματος.  Η λειτουργία είναι διαθέσιμη μόνο όταν το Πεδίο Email έχει αντιστοιχιστεί στο LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The colon after "Փոստի հատկանիշը" is misplaced. It should be part of the sentence's structure, not just hanging after the word.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Եթե ​​նշված է, բոլոր նոր օգտվողները կստանան ողջույնի նամակ: Հասանելի է միայն այն դեպքում, երբ Փոստի հատկանիշը քարտեզագրված է LDAP-ին: should be changed to Եթե ​​նշված է, բոլոր նոր օգտվողները կստանան ողջույնի նամակ։ Հասանելի է միայն այն դեպքում, երբ Փոստի հատկանիշը քարտեզագրված է LDAP-ին։

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ສະບັບນີ້' (sabap ni) in 'ສະບັບນີ້ໃຊ້ໄດ້ເມື່ອ...' is somewhat ambiguous and doesn't directly translate to 'this version' or 'this setting'. While understandable, it's not the most precise translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing 'ສະບັບນີ້' with 'ການຕັ້ງຄ່າ' (kan tang kha) to more accurately convey 'this setting'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ຄຸນນະພາບອີເມລ໌ຖືກນໍາໃຊ້ກັບ LDAP' (kun na phap email thuk nam sai kap LDAP) is grammatically correct but sounds a little stiff.  A more natural phrasing would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing 'ຄຸນນະພາບອີເມລ໌ຖືກນໍາໃຊ້ກັບ LDAP' with 'ຖ້າຈຸດໝາຍອີເມລ໌ຖືກນໍາໃຊ້ກັບ LDAP' (tha jut mai email thuk nam sai kap LDAP) which translates to 'If email attribute is mapped to LDAP'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a period (.) after "Dostępna wyłącznie, jeśli Atrybut poczty jest mapowany do LDAP." which isn't consistent with the English tooltip which does not have a period at the end of the sentence. While not technically incorrect, it may affect visual consistency.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the period at the end of the sentence: "Dostępna wyłącznie, jeśli Atrybut poczty jest mapowany do LDAP"

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'If checked' is awkwardly translated as 'Dacă opțiunea este bifată'. It would be more natural to use 'Dacă este activată' or 'Dacă este selectată'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Dacă este activată

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Атрибут почты" is a literal translation of "Mail Attribute". A more natural and understandable translation in Russian would be something like "Атрибут электронной почты" or "Почтовый атрибут".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Атрибут электронной почты

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "යොමුවූවා නම්" (yomuvoova naam) is not the most natural way to say "If checked." A more accurate translation would be "පහසු කළොත්" (pahasu kalau) or "මැක් කරන විට" (maek karana vith).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පහසු කළොත් සියලු නව පරිශීලකයින් පිළිගැනීමේ ලිස්තුවක් ලැබෙනු ඇත. Available only when Mail Attribute is mapped to LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "මැක් කරන විට" translates to 'when marking', which doesn't quite capture the meaning of checking a box. It needs to be a more neutral term for 'checked'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පහසු කළොත් සියලු නව පරිශීලකයින් පිළිගැනීමේ ලිස්තුවක් ලැබෙනු ඇත. Available only when Mail Attribute is mapped to LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'පරිශීලකයින්' is correct but can be more elegantly replaced with 'පරිශීලකයන්' for better readability. While both are acceptable, the latter is slightly preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පහසු කළොත් සියලු නව පරිශීලකයන් පිළිගැනීමේ ලිස්තුවක් ලැබෙනු ඇත. Available only when Mail Attribute is mapped to LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Mail Attribute' is translated as 'Pošta'. While 'Pošta' is technically correct for 'Mail', in this context, it's more appropriate to use a term that refers to the 'Email Address' attribute within the LDAP configuration. 'Pošta' can also mean 'post office', which can be confusing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider translating 'Mail Attribute' as 'Atribút e-mailu' or 'Adresa e-mailu' for clarity.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovenian translation uses a comma (,) before 'Na voljo samo'. While grammatically acceptable, a period (.) would be more common and idiomatic in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Če je označeno, bodo vsi novi uporabniki prejeli pozdravno pismo. Na voljo samo, če je poštni atribut preslikan v LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ц́е' is an awkward abbreviation of 'ће'. It's better to use the full form for clarity and professionalism.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ће

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Mejl' is a transliteration and not a proper Serbian word. The correct Serbian word for 'Mail' is 'Email'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Email

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'će dobiti pismo dobrodošlice' can be slightly improved for flow. A more natural phrasing would be 'primaće pismo dobrodošlice'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: primaće pismo dobrodošlice

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'welcome letter' is translated as 'hoş geldiniz yazısı'. While technically correct, a more natural and common translation for a system-generated welcome letter in Turkish would be 'hoş geldin mesajı' or 'kullanıcı hoş geldin mesajı'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: hoş geldin mesajı

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Available only when Mail Attribute is mapped to LDAP' is translated as 'Yalnızca Posta Özelliği LDAP ile eşleştirildiğinde kullanılabilir'. While understandable, a more natural phrasing would emphasize that the feature is enabled *because* the mail attribute is mapped.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Yalnızca Posta Özelliği LDAP ile eşleştiğinde kullanılabilir.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "зіставляється з LDAP" is a literal translation of "mapped to LDAP" and sounds unnatural in Ukrainian. A more natural phrasing would be "пов'язаний з LDAP" or "налаштований для LDAP".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Якщо позначено, усі нові користувачі отримають вітальний лист. Доступно, лише коли атрибут пошти пов'язаний з LDAP.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Nếu được chọn" could be more naturally phrased. While technically correct, it feels slightly stiff in Vietnamese.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nếu được kích hoạt

ai_spell_check_issues.description: “Mail Attribute” is translated as “Thuộc Tính Thư”. While “thư” can mean letter, in this context, it's referring to an email attribute. It's better to use a more technical term.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nếu được kích hoạt, tất cả người dùng mới sẽ nhận được thư chào mừng. Chỉ khả dụng khi Thuộc Tính Email được ánh xạ tới LDAP.
